The first method of establishing a boundary. In all karman rituals, one should first announce: Have those who have not received the full precepts left? Do the absent monks declare their purity? What

Except for establishing boundaries, there is no method of receiving consent.
Moreover, the two boundaries should not be connected, but should leave an interval in between;

If a precepts platform is established within the large boundary, first set up the four directional signs of the precepts platform, and outside, at least one cubit apart, set up the inner signs of the large boundary. Outside, according to the distance, also set up the four directional signs.
Have an experienced monk announce the directional signs, and in the assembly, appoint a capable person to perform the karman to establish the boundary.
One should first establish the large boundary, and then establish the ritual arena.
If one wishes to proclaim the marks of this large boundary, one should start from the southeast corner of the outer mark and go around in the four directions once;
and also proclaim the inner marks, also going around once.
Say:
That is the outer mark, this is the inner mark, this is one round of the inner and outer marks of the large boundary.
Proclaim this three times.
If there is no ritual arena inside, then just proclaim the outer marks.

In general, there are three kinds of expressing desires:

Second, at the time of the self-admittance ceremony, one expresses one's desires to participate in the self-admittance ceremony;
